amendment.description: To require the Under Secretary for Emergency Preparedness and Response to review any outstanding claims by the University of North Dakota relating to damages and costs associated with the April 1997 flooding in North Dakota and report to Congress on the efforts to resolve such claims.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1358 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1358 proposed by Senator Byrd for Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S9783-9785; text: CR S9784) To require the Under Secretary for Emergency Preparedness and Response to review any outstanding claims by the University of North Dakota relating to damages and costs associated with the April 1997 flooding in North Dakota and report to Congress on the efforts to resolve such claims.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1358 proposed by Senator Byrd for Senator Conrad.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1358 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
